entry.title: Time to get ready for the storm
entry.content: This blog will discuss music, climate, weather, climate and weather in music, and climate and weather in other media (mediums?). Most of all, it will be an outlet for me to share music that I love.
entry.summary: This blog will discuss music, climate, weather, climate and weather in music, and climate and weather in other media (mediums?). Most of all, it will be an outlet for me to share music that I love.
